name: Baj Baj Castle
description:
This game is my Bachelor's project for the university of KTU.

It is a roguelite dungeon-crawler with procedurally generated dungeons, a fairly unique mouse-based combat system with tons of loot. While in the Castle, you can upgrade your character with treasure you find during your Escape attempts.

Current features:

  • Procedurally generated levels
  • Generated loot
  • Character upgrades
  • 36 weapons
  • 4 consumables
  • 5 enemies
  • 5 objects
